question: Which Indian journalist has been selected as the outstanding media-person in a national award of Kerala Media Academy?
explanation:
Veteran journalist and the chairman of The Hindu Group N Ram, has been selected as the outstanding media-person in a national award instituted by Kerala Media Academy.
The award is said to be instituted for fearless and brilliant journalistic work at a national level. As a part of the academy’s 40th anniversary celebration, it is presented to N Ram for his contribution towards journalism for nearly four decades. The award is to be presented by the Chief Minister of Kerala, Pinarayi Vijayan in the month of March. Recently, ‘The Hindu Tamil’ has won the Election Commission of India’s award for its voter awareness and education campaign in 2019.
